Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting details i was 2\3rds over the kingston rhinecliff bridge headed towards dutchess county(east). as i scanned the horizon i saw this black cigar shaped craft descending towards the wsw at a 30 degree angle. it stopped for a second then went straight down rather quickly below the hill\treeline about 2 or 3 miles ese of my position. i estimate about a mile or so e or ese of rhinebeck,ny. i drove around that area to see if i could see it again or find someone that had with no luck. on arriving home i got on my ham radio and asked around locally if anyone had seen or heard anything, with no luck. just the usual ''what have you been smoking over there" comments. when i called the rhinebeck state police barracks (a trooper lucas answered)they were a bit more diplomatic when i asked if any ufo's had been reported that morning. saying "no, but we will certainly keep our eyes open..."
Summary: Black cigar, or disc seen on edge, close to horizon descending at 30 degrees then stopped for a second and dropped straight down behind hill...
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rhinebeck
There were no other sightings in Rhinebeck on or around June 10th 2008
